faq.question: Is it legal to download YouTube videos?
faq.answer: You should only download videos you have permission to use. Always respect copyright laws and YouTube's Terms of Service.

faq.question: What video qualities are supported?
faq.answer: We support all qualities available on YouTube, including 4K (2160p), Full HD (1080p), HD (720p), and SD (480p).

faq.question: Can I download YouTube playlists?
faq.answer: Yes, our downloader supports downloading entire YouTube playlists. Just paste the playlist URL and we'll process all videos.

faq.question: Is there a limit on downloads?
faq.answer: No, there are no limits on the number of videos you can download. Our service is completely free to use.

faq.question: Do I need to install any software?
faq.answer: No installation required! Our YouTube downloader works directly in your web browser.
